Key Match Events: The Bulls came back from a 15-point deficit to win 125-113
LaVine scored four crucial points at the four-minute mark to help stave off a Hawks rally
Post-Match Reflections: The Bulls snapped a three-game skid to improve to 4-6 for the season
Miscellaneous Highlights: Seven other Bulls players reached double figures
Ayo Dosunmu had a team-high 19 points off the bench
Nikola Vucevic and Coby White also scored 18 points each
Josh Giddey had 13 points, six rebounds and seven assists
Others: The Bulls will play three of their next four games on the road
The only home game during the stretch is against the Houston Rockets on Nov. 17
